name: Safaricross
overview: Trade & Demand Safaricross we have launched a Trade & Demand program. Our market segments will be trading in their old electronics and get cash based on the current value of that particular item. For the demand, our market segment have an option to either take the cash from the item they are trading in or put that amount as a down payment for an electronic item they are interested in. Safaricross is in the IT and Marketing Consulting business, we have partnered with industry leaders alike; IBM, Blackberry, LG, Apple, HP, Dell, Juniper Network and we distribute these products through Ingram Micro. We are a growing and ambitious company with a lot of talent from all area of business, Information Technology and Systems, Finance and Marketing. We also operate in Southern Africa, one of fastest growing markets in Technology and Innovation. Our presence in this region has brought tremendous growth in sales and revenue. Competitor Our Trade & Demand program is different from our competitors in a way that, our competitors like do the trade, they do not give customers an option of either use those credits towards purchasing a newer item or just take the cash. But Safaricross we do offer that option.
